credit_line: Gift of the Lynes Family Collection
title: Equivocal Colors
description: A surrealist composition painted in portrait format.
inscriptions: l.r.:Yves Tanguy 4[2 or 3]; label on verso:ACQUAVELLA GALLERIES, Inc./18 East 79th Street/New York, N.Y. 10021/ Exhibition "YVES TANGUY"/November 7th - December 7th, 1974/Exhibition #27, Equivocal Colors/1943
signed: Signature and date lower right, in black: "YVES TANGUY 43".
